## 🧪 Definition of Done erfüllt?

- [ ] User story fulfilled
- [ ] Documentation updated

- [ ] Migrations added/changed
- [ ] Routes registered
- [ ] Config changes documented
- [ ] Composer dependencies updated
- [ ] Artisan Commands work
